com.hlag.oversigt.core.eventsource

Class ScheduledEventSource<T extends OversigtEvent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractScheduledService
      • com.hlag.oversigt.core.eventsource.ScheduledEventSource<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractExchangeEventSource, AbstractJdbcEventSource, AbstractJiraEventSource, AbstractSslAwareEventSource, CpuUsageGraphEventSource, JenkinsPipelineStatusEventSource, MotivationEventSource

    public abstract class ScheduledEventSource<T extends OversigtEvent>
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractScheduledService
    Scheduled EventSource - produces events with specified time period. Basically, based on Guava's AbstractScheduledService
    Author:
    avarabyeu
